com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d

Class MleJ2dPlatformData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.MleJ2dPlatformData

  • public class MleJ2dPlatformData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates data that is specific to the J2D platform.

    The J2D platform is a Java 2D platform that is compatible with the Java2D API.

    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Field Summary

      int m_height
